DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood , tissue , bone marrow patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study biomarkers sample young patient Wilms tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Biomarkers Samples From Younger Patients With Wilms Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To analyze 250 favorable-histology Wilms tumor ( FHWT ) sample patient register NWTS4 gain 1q 15q , loss 1p , 16q , 17p , 22q subtelomeric multiplex ligation-dependent probe amplification ( MLPA ) , determine association relapse-free overall survival . - To develop robust multiplex MLPA test use multiple synthesize probe target identify significantly associate relapse Aim 1 . - To validate multiplex MLPA test design test Aim 2 independent set 1727 FHWT 250 anaplastic WT register NWTS-5 . OUTLINE : Archived DNA sample analyze gain 1q 15q , loss 1p , 16q , 17p , 22q MLPA . Assay result research accuracy , clinical validity , sensitivity , precision , potential analytical interference .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : DNA sample FHWT patient register : NWTS4 NWTS5 focal diffuse anaplasia tumor PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
